3faaca7b-292b-4628-8a00-90be4abd8571.name: 战斗反射
3faaca7b-292b-4628-8a00-90be4abd8571.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

1e8fa850-1a97-4ee7-b373-ee8dcf8d3c90.name: 健康
1e8fa850-1a97-4ee7-b373-ee8dcf8d3c90.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

52d60726-8386-4203-8669-bffb8c762bf4.name: Fit, Very
52d60726-8386-4203-8669-bffb8c762bf4.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

796e8142-17cb-42cc-a5c7-cffa68562988.name: 幸运
796e8142-17cb-42cc-a5c7-cffa68562988.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

3b56a73f-abec-426f-9963-2ced563b18ed.name: Luck, Extraordinary
3b56a73f-abec-426f-9963-2ced563b18ed.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

da45420d-6c01-47aa-a4b4-506fc6d463d0.name: 易于命中
da45420d-6c01-47aa-a4b4-506fc6d463d0.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

55bd3702-b9e4-4607-a823-18d3183e1071.name: 标志性装备
55bd3702-b9e4-4607-a823-18d3183e1071.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

70891a5c-f0b1-4568-b94d-71d3c7343a91.name: 8 points spent on
70891a5c-f0b1-4568-b94d-71d3c7343a91.notes: Or on any primary or secondary skill
